question: Who among the following had drafted the Commonwealth of India Bill 1925 which put forward demands for seven fundamental rights?
explanation: The Commonwealth of India Bill was drafted non officially by Mrs. Besant and a few of her Indian friends. It was approved by a convention held at Cawnpore in April 1925. It was introduced in the House of Commons by Mr. George Lansbury in December 1925, under the title, "The Commonwealth of India Bill" which put forward demands for seven fundamental rights.
